com.acs.bluetooth

Class BluetoothReaderManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acs.bluetooth.BluetoothReaderManager

  • public class BluetoothReaderManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The BluetoothReaderManager class detects ACS Bluetooth readers.

    • Method Detail

      • detectReader

        public boolean detectReader(BluetoothGatt gatt,
                   BluetoothReaderGattCallback callback)
        Detects the reader. The manager returns the result by invoking onReaderDetection() callback. You need to register the callback by calling setOnReaderDetectionListener() method.
        Parameters:
        gatt - the BluetoothGatt of reader.
        callback - the BluetoothReaderGattCallback of reader.
        Returns:
        true if this operation was initiated successfully, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the gatt or callback is empty.

      • setOnReaderDetectionListener

        public void setOnReaderDetectionListener(BluetoothReaderManager.OnReaderDetectionListener listener)
        Registers a callback to be invoked when the reader is detected.
        Parameters:
        listener - the callback that will run.
